GMaps.js — Texts

You can add text elements by:

map.addText({
  lat: 30.257806291133193,
  lng: -97.72566276602447,
  text: '♥♥♥ Most Excellent Tacos ♥♥♥'
});

You must define latitude, longitude and the text of the text.

Note: Also, you can define a mouse event callback methods, which will be triggered when the overlay's DOM element is interacted with.
